program atcoder_ABC171_E
    implicit none
    integer :: n, i, r
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: a
    read(*,*) n
    allocate(a(n)) r = 0
    do i = 1, n
        read(*,*) a(i)
        r = ieor(r, a(i)) end do
    if (n == 0) then   ! edge case, but input would have n >=1 probably. write (*,*)
    else 
        write(*, '(I0)', advance='no') ieor(r, a(1)) do i = 2, n
            write(*, '(A)', advance='no') ' '
            write(*, '(I0)', advance='no') ieor(r, a(i)) end do
        write(*,*)  !
